text:
Is #Chloroquine (a #Quinoline based antimalarial drug) safe for #Covid19Canada Tx, @globalnews?

 Chloroquine can cause permanent damage with just 1 dose. 

This is why @CanadianForces, @rcmpgrcpolice-serving & retired-are embroiled in the #MefloquineMassTort legal action today. https://t.co/BXHWfWpu8a https://t.co/ok7zcaxWdr
